name: make a connection with me, please
name_original: make a connection with me, please
description:
Use arrow keys to move.

Salvatore Pane is the author of Last Call in the City of Bridges in addition to Mega Man 3 from Boss Fight Books. His work has appeared in American Short Fiction, Indiana Review, Paste, Kotaku, and many other venues. He teaches at the University of St. Thomas and can be reached at www.salvatore-pane.com
